The pages on this site outline the technical components of **EDUC 315: Principles of Teaching Math and Science in Urban Classrooms II** at Howard University, taught by [Professor Nathan Alexander](https://professornaite.github.io){target="_blank"}. 

The information on this page will serve as a technical <u>*companion*</u> to our Canvas site [here](https://canvas.howard.edu/courses/53402){target="_blank"}.

This site will support you with problem sets, technical aspects of pedagogical questions relevant to teaching STEM in grades 4-6, and your use of a pedagogical praxis in your classroom.

Click [here](modules.html){target="_blank"} for course module details.
